name: English Warrior
description:
English Warrior is a simple, traditional RPG about a young warrior who must defeat a dragon to help the kingdom. The warrior must get stronger by fighting and completing English challenges scattered across the land. Choose your character and start your adventure now!This game was intended as a teaching tool. It uses a mix of English and Japanese dialogue, and is best for a Japanese speaker learning English. However, it is also very playable for a native English speaker too.Features:
  • Bi-lingual English-Japanese gameplay
  • 8 unoriginal but distinct classes to choose from
  • Simple click-to-move controls
  • Familiar RPG mechanics
  • Fun to speedrun
Controls:
  • Alt+Enter to full screen
  • WASD, Arrow Keys, or Mouse-click to move
  • Z or Enter or Space or left-click to interact with objects
  • X or Esc or right-click to cancel
  • Shift to run
Help the kingdom and learn some English!

- - - - -

This game is being put up for historical / archival reasons.
There is no intention of any further updates.
